channel.title: CVE Feed for HP, Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HP, Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-2209|2024-08-01T19:03:39.393Z -- hp%2C%20inc. -- hp%20printer%20firmware%20update%20utility
item.description: A user with administrative privileges can create a compromised dll file of the same name as the original dll within the HP printer’s Firmware Update Utility (FUU) bundle and place it in the Microsoft Windows default downloads directory which can lead to potential arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-2209|2024-03-26T23:49:12.512Z -- hp%2C%20inc. -- hp%20printer%20firmware%20update%20utility
item.description: A user with administrative privileges can create a compromised dll file of the same name as the original dll within the HP printer’s Firmware Update Utility (FUU) bundle and place it in the Microsoft Windows default downloads directory which can lead to potential arbitrary code execution.
